text: Search for a file key.pem and cert.pem in your folder tree <@U2Y3JHRP1>
<@U2Y3JHRP1> - so your two validating peers are able to connect ok?
<@U0PB67X4K> they are able to connect without TLS setup.
the easiest thing to do would be to concatenate the CA and TLS cert into a single file (with the CA first)
